VPR.A: The largest flow is between {Neighborhood Store} and {Cold Storage}.

VPR.A: The smallest flow is between {Spare Parts Depot} and {North Hub}.

NF.Q: In the column Warehouse of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 486? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
Between which pairs of nodes in column Retail and column Warehouse is the flow between 214 and 591? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {585} from node {Outlet Mall} to {Regional Warehouse A}, a flow of {324} from node {Outlet Mall} to {Spare Parts Depot}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 108 and 121? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {111} from node {Spare Parts Depot} to {West Hub}, a flow of {116} from node {South Hub} to {Auto Factory}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node East Hub to node Electronics Plant and from node Central Warehouse to node Express Sorting Center, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Central Warehouse} to node {Express Sorting Center} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node East Hub to node Electronics Plant and from node East Hub to node Textile Mill, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {East Hub} to node {Electronics Plant} is equal to the flow from node {East Hub} to node {Textile Mill}.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Cold Storage to node Express Sorting Center, from node West Hub to node Auto Factory, and from node North Hub to node Chemical Plant, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Cold Storage} to node {Express Sorting Center} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Warehouse of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Warehouse is {Central Warehouse}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Outlet Mall to target node Auto Factory? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Outlet Mall to node Auto Factory is: {Outlet Mall, Central Warehouse, North Hub, Auto Factory}.
